snippet.title: Sky Harvest 20 Min Exclusive Demo Footage | 4K
snippet.description:
#devlog #unity #gamedevelopment 
#indiegamedev #devlog #gamedev #gamedevelopment #indiedev #unity3d #unitygameengine 

🔗Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2482840/Sky_Harvest/
🔗Discord: https://discord.gg/Same8bKCEF
🔗Ko-fi: https://ko-fi.com/hamzahkirmani

Armed with hand-me-down tools and some cash, you begin your new life as THE Chief Farmer, a position your grandfather once excelled in. Can you honor his legacy and transform the overgrown, untamed and desolate floating island into a flourishing farm abundant with produce?
 
👤 SOCIAL MEDIA 
►Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/skyharvestgame/
►LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/hamzahkirmani/ 
►Website: WIP
►Email: hamzahkirmani@gmail.com 

🎮 ASSETS USED
►Skybox Extended Shader: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/free-skybox-extended-shader-107400
►Puppet Kid: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/humanoids/puppet-kid-230773
►POLYGON Prototype: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/exterior/polygon-prototype-low-poly-3d-art-by-synty-137126
►Mixamo Animations: https://www.mixamo.com/
►ProBuilder: Inside Package Manager

🛠️ TOOLS USED
►Game Engine: Unity3D (https://www.unity3d.com/)  
►Art: Photoshop (https://www.adobe.com/in/products/photoshop.html) 
►Video Recording: Geforce Experience (https://www.nvidia.com) 
►Video Editing: Movavi 2023 (https://www.movavi.com/)
►Scripting IDE: Visual Studio 
►Notes Making: Microsoft Word

⏰ TIMESTAMPS
00:00 MAIN MENU
00:08 STORY CUTSCENE
00:38 CHARACTER CUSTOMIZATION
02:48 DEMO STARTS
18:14 BONUS - FISHING
